base_description: Round gray clock with simple design.
part_description: Circular face with two hands; one orange, one yellow. Numbers positioned around the edge.
internal_interaction_description: The clock hands rotate around a central pivot point, with the orange hand representing minutes and the yellow hand representing hours. The hands are connected to an internal mechanism that regulates their movement, ensuring consistent timekeeping.
external_interaction_description: The clock is mounted on a wall, interacting with people by displaying the current time. It requires an external power source, such as a battery, to function. Users glance at it to check the time, relying on its accuracy for daily scheduling.
